title: Auto-sync hive at key events
description:
Add automatic JSONL sync at strategic points to prevent cells from being lost when processes exit unexpectedly.

## Changes
1. `hive_create_epic` - sync after creating epic + subtasks (so workers can see them)
2. `swarm_complete` - sync before worker exits (persist their work)
3. Process exit hook - safety net via `process.on('beforeExit')` in hive.ts module init

## Context
- Lazy write pattern is intentional (mark dirty â†’ explicit flush)
- These auto-syncs are strategic checkpoints, not replacing manual sync
- Sync is idempotent - no-op if nothing dirty

## TDD Required
- Test that hive_create_epic syncs (mock adapter.syncToJsonl)
- Test that swarm_complete syncs
- Test process exit hook registration
